705999f-a.text:
New Jersey Avenue (poles, right), east side, south from Pitkin to Belmont Avenues, showin a playground, erected by the City of New York. A row of frame dwellings formerly stood here.
September 14, 1940
P. L. Sperr
705999f-a.folder: New Jersey Avenue & Belmont Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
705999f-a.original_title: Brooklyn: New Jersey Avenue - Belmont Avenue
